ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us

SINT_NIKLAAS.TITLE: Sint-Niklaas
SINT_NIKLAAS.DESCRIPTION: Sint-Niklaas is a city in Belgium, known for its rich history and vibrant culture. It is the birthplace of the Van Hese family.

BRENT.TEXT_1: Meet Brent, a passionate member of the Van Hese family. Born and raised in Sint-Niklaas, he has always been deeply connected to his family roots and traditions.
BRENT.TEXT_2: Brent loves spending time with family and exploring the beautiful landscapes of Belgium. He is known for his warm personality and dedication to keeping family traditions alive.

DAVID_AND_DEBORA.TEXT_1: David is a cornerstone of the Van Hese family, bringing wisdom and guidance to all family gatherings. His stories and experiences have shaped the family's values.
DAVID_AND_DEBORA.TEXT_2: With years of experience and a deep love for his family, David continues to be an inspiring figure. He enjoys sharing family history and creating new memories with loved ones.
